title: High Military Presence
description: In 2020, Eritrea had 13.36% of its total labor force in the armed forces, indicating a significant military presence.

title: Widespread Open Defecation
description: In 2016, 67% of Eritrea's population practiced open defecation, with 88.65% in rural areas.

title: Low Business Regulatory Environment
description: Eritrea scored 1 out of 6 in the CPIA business regulatory environment rating in 2023, indicating a challenging business climate.

title: Poor Financial Management
description: In 2023, Eritrea received a score of 1 out of 6 for the quality of budgetary and financial management, reflecting poor financial governance.

title: Lack of Transparency and Accountability
description: Eritrea's CPIA rating for transparency, accountability, and corruption in the public sector was 1 out of 6 in 2023, indicating significant governance issues.
